item.title: Blogging at ISMB2016 Florida for Plos Computational Biology
item.description:
Blogging at #SCSOrlando2016 and #ISMB2016 for #PLOSCB

In a week I will be attending SCS and ISMB 2016 in Orlando Walt Disney World Resort. Awesome, huh? I joined PLOSCB bloggers crew to blog for you about Student Council Symposium #SCSOrlando2016, Carrer Development #BoF and #bigdata topics.

Don’t hesitate to meet me at my oral presentation of poster and poster sessions:

DECONVOLUTION OF CELL AND ENVIRONMENT SPECIFIC SIGNALS AND THEIR INTERACTIONS FROM COMPLEX MIXTURES IN BIOLOGICAL SAMPLES

SCS

Talk

Time: Friday, July 8, 4:15 pm — 4:30 pm Room: Parrot (Swan Hall)


Download
Poster session

Time: 6:05 pm — 8:00 pm Room: Parrot (Swan Hall)

ISMB Poster #OP17

Talk

Time: Sunday, July 10, 11:40 am — 12:40 pm Room: America’s Seminar

Poster session

On display

Time: Monday, July 11, 10:00 a.m. through Tuesday, July 12, 2:30 p.m.

With authors

Time: Monday, July 11, 5:40 pm — 7:30 pm Room: Southern Hemisphere Ballroom

See you there, under the sun of Florida!

Disclaimer: Any views expressed are those of the author, not necessarily those of PLOS.

Exported from Medium on June 29, 2016.

View the original

item.title: Elements
item.description:
Editor note: These are the styles available with the spectral theme by HTML5 UP (n33). Note that some elements require classes, ala <ul class="icons"> or <div class="6u 12u$(medium)">. View the source for examples. And see his skel docs to grok the CSS.

Text

This is bold and this is strong. This is italic and this is emphasized. This is superscript text and this is subscript text. This is underlined and this is code: for (;;) { ... }. Finally, this is a link.

Heading with a Subtitle

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet nullam id egestas urna aliquam

Blandit adipiscing eu felis iaculis volutpat ac adipiscing accumsan faucibus. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus lorem ipsum dolor sit amet nullam adipiscing eu felis.
Preformatted
i = 0;

while (!deck.isInOrder()) {
  print 'Iteration ' + i;
  deck.shuffle();
  i++;
}

print 'It took ' + i + ' iterations to sort the deck.';
